name: Food Smasher
description:
Coming Soon on Google Play

Food Smasher is a clicker game in which you smash food and get the highest score, which you can then compare with your highest or highest of your friends.

How To Play:

Tap or press any key to damage opponent. With every opponent defeated, you get cash. If you have enought cash, you can increase your damage by opening menu and then clicking button with how many levels you want to increase by. Also there is a timer and score.  You have only 10 minutes to get the most score you can by defeating your opponents. After the time expires, you can see your score and your highest score. Then you can restart the game and try to beat your highest score.
